Project: Train/Test Split

This project demonstrates splitting datasets into train/test sets (and validation) with scikit-learn.

Summary

  • Goal: Evaluate generalization by splitting data correctly
  • Concepts: Random state, stratification, data leakage
  • Steps: Split → Train → Validate → Test

Notebook

  • Rendered notebook: Will appear here once the .ipynb is added.
